articles.title: Trump’s move to silence pro-democracy media sparks outrage - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Voice of America and Radio Free Europe among outlets forced to make cuts as U.S. seeks to curtail funding.
articles.content: Trump on Friday signed an executive order to reduce to the minimum the functions of several agencies, including the United States Agency for Global Media (USAGM,) which oversees media including VOA, … [+1009 chars]

articles.title: The weird economy has finally come for travel — just in time to screw up your summer plans - Business Insider
articles.description: Travel demand is showing signs of slowing down. And as Americans spend less on trips this summer, that could result in some good deals.
articles.content:
Just when you thought you'd be making your summer travel plans Japan or Paris anyone? economic anxiety appears to be rearing its ugly head.
